phrases: She should be at the temple at this hour.
The line to see the Lady Cleric is here.
Please have your ticket in hand.
My body feels so much lighter.
Looks like she is working hard again today.
If we find a cleric who can exorcise evil...
But she rarely takes on jobs to remove curse-based skills.
There may be some reason behind it,
but I am her best friend, and she will not even tell me.
I seem to be out of energy.
It appears as though you are working too hard, Lady Cleric.
That is quite the greeting for someone who is worried about you.
So what is the very capable receptionist from the guild doing here today?
I hate to ask this when I know you are tired,
but I needed to discuss something important with you.
Today's the day that Lola is going to introduce us to this cleric.
I had some time before we were supposed to meet up,
so I decided to get some advice from my master.
Hidden dungeon only I can enter!
Let me train in secret to become the strongest in the world!
Well, you have not come see me at all!
I feel like it is been about two weeks.
but I ran into a little problem.
A duke's daughter with a curse.
If it is a curse-based skill, it might have to do with her family.
You mean something to do with her ancestors?
Yeah, it happens all the time!
There is a skill to curse one's descendants.
You will need over 10,000 LP to Get Creative enough to create the skill to undo it.
It is probably best if you let that cleric girl handle it.
That is what I plan on doing, but...
I wonder what the Lady Cleric is like.
If she has the skill to exorcise things, she is probably at least part elf.
You do not see them very often.
It is great to fulfill some of your desires with other species.
You will get lots of extra LP with them!
You got to go for the glory!
S-So, Master, what would you do to earn about 10,000 LP?
I will whisper it to you.
Then you will have 10,000 LP in no time!
Sh-She is totally messing with me...
You probably will not be able to get 10,000 that quickly,
but I can teach you a skill that will be super useful in gaining LP.
Let your awesome master Olivia fill you in on the deets.
You will get the best bang for your buck!
It only takes a measly 300 LP to get, but it is effective as hell!
You will have some indescribable experiences!
Get Creative to make Lucky Lecher!
The Lady Cleric and Lola are going to show up soon!
Th-That Time I Faceplanted into Slime Boobs.
Damn, my luck just will not stop!
This is how effective Lucky Lecher is?
But this is going to affect my life.
I just need to use Editor to tinker with it a bit.
Causes erotic situations to occur with nearby members of the opposite sex.
with nearby members of the opposite sex.
with nearby members of the opposite sex.
As well as, Skill will not trigger during serious situations.
Skill will not trigger during serious situations.
Got To make sure these only happen at the right time.
You were totally staring at those other girls, too!
What is that supposed to mean?!
Sorry to keep you two waiting.
It is nice to meet you two.
My only advantage over her is my boobs!
I never should have let Noir meet her.
So this person you want me to look at...
She is the daughter of a duke.
I have actually looked at her before...
But I declined lifting her curse.
Do not you have a skill to lift curses?
I cannot lift the Sixteenth Year Death Curse.
She does not even have a week to live.
She suffers convulsions that pain her entire body.
Apparently, the intervals are getting shorter.
So her curse has progressed that far...
Luna, you do not need to feel responsible for this.
You save dozens of people every day.
That itself is an amazing feat.
It seems that Luna feels pretty responsible for this.
Maybe she does have some kind of secret.
Species: Half-elf Age: 17 Occupation: Cleric/Adventurer Skills: Skills:
Yeah, she definitely has the Lift Curse skill...
Skill: Lift Curse Skill: Erases curse skills.
However, the user's Skill: lifespan is reduced in proportion to Skill: the strength of the curse.
However, the user's... lifespan is reduced?!
So when she lifts the curse, Luna's own lifespan is...
Elves live far longer than humans.
But apparently, even so, Miss Maria's curse is so powerful
that her lifespan cannot cover it.
Lead me to Miss Maria's home.
B-But you just said you could not lift her curse.
Could you leave us for a bit?
I would like to talk to Luna in private.
I took a look at your stats with my skill.
If you cure Miss Maria, that means your life...
She is at death's door, is not she?
How could I possibly leave her alone knowing her life is at stake?
Just like my mother would have done.
My mother was also a cleric.
Even though she knew that her lifespan was at stake,
She kept her chipping away at her own lifespan to save those who were suffering.
And now, she is no longer with us.
I am very proud of my mother.
And because I am my mother's daughter,
I want to use this power for others...
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
W-We need to heal him immediately.
Why are we born into this world?
I still do not know the answer to that.
I am sure you will find that answer someday.
I guess you have already found yours, Luna.
I can save lives and bring about so many smiles.
I guess your cleric title is not just for show.
I do not want to die
I-I do not want to die...
Where did all of her bravery go?!
Do not worry, she will be awake in no time.
Do not worry, Mommy's right here.
Come on, now, up you go.
I cannot believe you saw that!
Y-You do not need to worry about me...
I am not scared of... anything...
Luna, let us figure out another way.
I-I just cannot contain my excitement!
But you said you were scared of curses.
Just tell us the truth already.
You are scared, are not you?
If I save Maria, it is very likely that I am going to...
Just thinking about that is terrifying.
I am a failure as a cleric.
You will die if you lift a curse?
You never told me that before!
I am sorry I did not tell you.
So I have been hanging out with you this whole time
I am so mad that I was so clueless.
I am sorry I did not realize how much you were suffering.
You are always like this, Luna!
You always put others before yourself!
There is something great about these two.
You ended up witnessing such an embarrassing scene.
It was a feast for my eyes.
Er, I was very moved by you two.
If we try to save Miss Maria, then Luna will...
Things are not completely hopeless yet.
I will be able to make this work without any casualties.
Earlier, I just gave it a shot, and took a look at Luna's Lift Curse skill.
However, the user's lifespan is reduced in
proportion to the strength of the curse.
I tried to get rid of the whole lifespan is reduced part, but...
There is no way I can do 10,000 LP.
However, the user's lifespan is reduced in
proportion to the strength of the curse.
I will just change lifespan to finances.
However, the user's finances are reduced in
There is a way to save Miss Maria without having to sacrifice Luna.
But I do not have quite enough LP to use this skill...
Making money and satisfying worldly desires...
And doing exciting things with attractive members of the opposite sex...
I cannot use my Get Creative or Editor skills without LP.
You know, you cannot make an omelet without breaking a few eggs...
Can you think of a way for me to get 2,000 more LP?
And maybe something that will increase Luna's finances.
You make it sound so easy.
I highly doubt there is anything that convenient.
A certain noble holds the perfect event for this occasion every week.
The next time it will be held is this weekend,
so we will make it just in time to lift the curse.
What kind of event is it?
Sorry to keep you waiting, my dudes!
Tonight, another ten that I am jealous of... I mean...
We will be meeting some reckless scoundrels who will be showing off their hot girlfriends
for a chance at one million rels!
So vent all the stress you can at the sight of these shitty normies!
Apparently, the host of this event has been betrayed by women countless times.
And the gentlemen who have gathered here have experienced something similar.
Most of them, apparently, do not have any lovers.
Th-This is not a pride event...
Let the Harem Pride Event commence!
I-I think I want to go home now...
I was just fixing your sheets!
I am just going to sleep in them as-is.
We used to sleep together like this all the time.
There is no way... my LP would go up...
Next time, The Future of This Harem.
